resources.string: The new round will have the same members and contributors as the previous one.
Lichess detects round completion, but can get it wrong. Use this to set it manually.
Optional long description of the tournament. %1$s is available. Length must be less than %2$s characters.

string.name: sourceSingleUrl
string.comment:
An input box. The user can add the external URL the PGN playback of the game is coming from, to set up their event broadcast.
Could be alternatively stated as "Source URL for the PGN".

resources.string: URL that Lichess will check to get PGN updates. It must be publicly accessible from the Internet.
Up to 64 Lichess game IDs, separated by spaces.
Start date in the tournament local timezone: %s
Optional, if you know when the event starts
Definitively delete the round and all its games.
Delete all games of this round. The source will need to be active in order to re-create them.
Definitively delete the entire tournament, all its rounds and all its games.

string.name: showScores
string.comment: An option for creating a broadcast (https://lichess.org/broadcast). This is optional, as scoring will be calculated automatically by Lichess, and some organisations prefer to do this manually or not show scores until the end - depending on how the tournament works.

resources.string: Show players\' scores based on game results
Optional: replace player names, ratings and titles

string.name: unrated
string.comment: Please do not translate simply as "casual". "Unrated" here refers to tournaments that are organised outside of Lichess. The rating in question will usually align to a FIDE federation.

string.name: openLichess
string.comment:
Appears as a link when a Lichess broadcast is embedded in an external website. Clicking it will take the user to the Lichess website, to view it in full.
For an example of what an embedded broadcast looks like, see https://lichess.org/developers under the section 'Embed a broadcast in your site'.

resources.string: Subscribe to be notified when each round starts. You can toggle bell or push notifications for broadcasts in your account preferences.
No boards yet. These will appear once games are uploaded.
Boards can be loaded with a source or via the %s
The broadcast will start very soon.
The broadcast has not yet started.
A public, real-time PGN source for this round. We also offer a %s for faster and more efficient synchronization.
Embed this broadcast in your website
